Perfect size and materials. It's absolutely perfect.

Wore this for a Halloween costume, and worked out. It has the same problem that all form fitting dresses have and rides up as you walk because of the smooth velvety fabric. The way it fit me (I am 5'0) it was a little longer than what is shown on the model, but would ride up so the extra length was appreciated.  For the price it's decent, but don't expect a prefect dress with flawless seams and perfectly sew on lace. The straps are adjustable and the charm has stayed on even through the wash (on delicate cycle). I hung dry it and it's doing fine.
